items.sentence: Tom says he's not planning to do that tomorrow.
It's very unlikely that Tom has ever done that.
I didn't know that Tom was planning to do that.
Would you be willing to show me how to do that?
I would advise you strongly to quit doing that.
Tom isn't likely to be excused from doing that.
You won't allow Tom to do that again, will you?
You weren't expecting Tom to do that, were you?
You weren't able to help Tom do that, were you?
You were hoping Tom could do that, weren't you?
